name: JSON

params.name: prettyPrint
params.description: Determines whether the JSON generator creates JSON content in pretty-print format with the content indented. Set to true to create indented content.

methods.name: deserialize
methods.signature: public static Object deserialize(String jsonString, System.Type apexType)
methods.description: Deserializes the specified JSON string into an Apex object of the specified type.

params.name: apexType
params.description: The JSON content to deserialize. The Apex type of the object that this method creates after deserializing the JSON content.

methods.name: deserializeStrict
methods.signature: public static Object deserializeStrict(String jsonString, System.Type apexType)
methods.description: Deserializes the specified JSON string into an Apex object of the specified type.

params.name: apexType
params.description: The JSON content to deserialize. The Apex type of the object that this method creates after deserializing the JSON content.

methods.name: deserializeUntyped
methods.description: Deserializes the specified JSON string into collections of primitive data types.

methods.name: serialize
methods.description: Serializes Apex objects into JSON content.

methods.name: serialize
methods.signature: public static String serialize(Object objectToSerialize, Boolean suppressApexObjectNulls)
methods.description: Suppresses null values when serializing Apex objects into JSON content.

params.name: suppressApexObjectNulls
params.description: The Apex object to serialize. If true, remove null values before serializing the JSON object.

methods.name: serializePretty
methods.description: Serializes Apex objects into JSON content and generates indented content using the pretty-print format.

methods.name: serializePretty
methods.signature: public static String serializePretty(Object objectToSerialize, Boolean suppressApexObjectNulls)
methods.description: Suppresses null values when serializing Apex objects into JSON content and generates indented content using the pretty-print format.

params.name: suppressApexObjectNulls
params.description: The Apex object to serialize. If true, remove null values before serializing the JSON object.

description: Contains methods for serializing Apex objects into JSON format and deserializing JSON content that was serialized using the serialize method in this class.
